survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Cloud Storage Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of cloud storage services to understand their satisfaction levels, pain points, and preferences for future improvements.

questions.question_text: How often do you use cloud storage services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you use cloud storage services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following cloud storage services do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question to allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following cloud storage services do you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use cloud storage services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an 'Other' option that includes a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use cloud storage services?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your current cloud storage service? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels accurately.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your current cloud storage service? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in a cloud storage service? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox with a limit of 3 selections to prioritize features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with a selection limit of 3 and an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in a cloud storage service? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1

questions.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving cloud storage services.
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text box to gather qualitative feedback. This can provide valuable insights for service improvements.
